reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Operation of Al-Jadah Health Center in Hiran District, Hajjah Governorate (Phase III)

description.narrative: 1- Saving life, maintaining its continuity, limiting the spread of diseases and epidemics, securing basic health and nutritional services and reproductive health, and supporting the health sector for some of the liberated districts in Hajjah Governorate and resettling them. 2- Preserving the environment and preventing the spread of epidemics by burning waste in the incinerator designated for that / continuing the work of the health center with medical, technical and administrative staff to provide health services

For 69,300 beneficiaries / 66,600 beneficiaries received primary health care / (1600) children and women received therapeutic feeding services / (1000) beneficiaries received immunization services / 6000 women received reproductive health services / treatment of the injured In epidemics, and protecting them from infection with epidemics, benefiting from the training and preparation of (20) volunteers, and implementing spraying campaigns for a number of (90) days according to need (seasonal)
Full readiness of the medical point to start providing primary health care and nutritional services

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
